participant_1.background:
I like to spend rainy days organizing my office supplies.
My most prized possession is the journal I keep of my travels, which I have filled with sketches and notes from my adventures.
my wife does not like me anymore.
i m applying for publishing jobs.
sometimes i feel like i ve already been through life once before.

participant_2.background:
I'm planning to work on my model car project and go to a baseball game.
i moved to america when i was 14.
i like drinking expensive wine.
i eat out more than three times a week.
I fear that my family will be judged for the way they are.

content.text: Hey! What are you up to?
I'm planning to work on my model car project and go to a baseball game today.
That sounds fun! I'm currently organizing my office supplies.
I'm glad you have something to keep you busy! I'm afraid I don't have anything to do today.
Maybe you could work on your model car project with me!
That's a great idea! I'll go get my supplies.
Sounds good! I'll get my supplies too.
This is really fun! I'm glad I suggested it.
Me too! It's a lot more fun than sitting around doing nothing.
I know, right? This is the best rainy day activity ever!
I agree! I'm so glad we decided to do this.
It's done! It looks so great!
It does! You did a great job!
Thanks! You did too!
We should do this again sometime.
I'd love to! That was so much fun.
This is great! I love baseball games.
Me too! This is the perfect way to end a perfect day.
I agree! This was the best day ever!
Me too! I'm so glad we decided to do this.
